title: Rebrand UI text to TechChandan AI Design

requirements.summary: Replace the header brand/logo text with "TechChandan AI Design" everywhere it appears in the header navigation UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The header brand/logo text renders exactly as "TechChandan AI Design" on desktop and mobile navigation.
No instances of "AI Design Studio" remain in the header UI.

file_operations.description: Update the header logo/brand text to render "TechChandan AI Design" (preferably sourced from the central site metadata/config) while keeping existing gradient styling and ensuring it appears consistently in both desktop and mobile header states.

If the brand text displayed in the global layout/footer is shared with header branding expectations, align it to the new brand name to avoid any lingering "AI Design Studio" occurrences in persistent navigation-adjacent UI.

requirements.summary: Update the Home page hero H1 to include the exact new brand name while preserving the existing gradient/AI-tech visual style and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The primary H1/hero title on the Home page includes the exact text "TechChandan AI Design".
The hero title remains visually consistent with the existing typography and gradient style (no layout break on mobile).

file_operations.description: Adjust the hero H1 so it includes the exact text "TechChandan AI Design" (ideally by composing the H1 with the existing gradient-emphasis span) and keep current typography/spacing so mobile layout remains intact.
Update any hero/branding copy in the central config to reflect the new brand name so the Home hero can consistently source/display "TechChandan AI Design" without duplicating strings.

requirements.summary: Update base HTML document title and central branding metadata/config to use "TechChandan AI Design".
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title includes "TechChandan AI Design".
The central site metadata/config brand name is set to "TechChandan AI Design".

file_operations.description: Update the base HTML document <title> so it includes "TechChandan AI Design".
Set the central site metadata/config brandName to "TechChandan AI Design" and ensure other branding text derived from it remains consistent.
